description:
Python
------

The Python tutorial will present the basic of the programming language
itself. Therefore, no extra package apart of the Jupyter notebook will
be required. However, we might have a preference for Python 3.6 over
Python 2.7. The tutorial will be based on the `SciPy lecture
notes <http://www.scipy-lectures.org/intro/language/python_language.html>`__.

The corresponding notebooks are available
`here <https://github.com/glemaitre/euroscipy-2017>`__
title: Python (1/2)
